lines.text:
[Remember]
the morning I walked in on you and Dad?
Making love. Don't play mother with me.
Well, it can. Maybe it won't be so bad here. But we'd better be careful.
You never gave me one before.
There may not be any... more for a while.

This is San Francisco. We have lost our New York signal. Radar sources confirm the explosion of nuclear devices there, in New York, and up and down the East Coast. Ladies and gentlemen, this is real. This is...

[interrupting with a high-pitched tone]
We interrupt this program at the request of the White House. This is a national emergency. This is an Emergency Action Notification. I repeat, we interrupt this program at the request of the White House. Do not use your telephone. Telephone lines should be kept open for official use. Important instructions will follow.
Ladies and gentlemen, the President of the United States.
[the TV suddenly goes dark, a blinding flash appears outside the living room window, and air raid sirens begin to wail]
Get down on the floor. Get down!
I don't know. Put your heads down! Cover your eyes! Oh my God. My God.

[crying]
Who did this, God damn you!
I'm sorry I'm late. Let's begin.

[hysterical]
Forget God! No one is touching him! No one is burying him until I find his bear! Do you hear me? You understand?
[Carol runs back to the house, pause]
...whosoever believeth in me shall never die.
I don't know what day it is, I've lost track. Henry thinks some miracle may save us yet, he's foolish. The cemetery's full, they're burning the bodies.

[after finding Hiroshi abandoned at home]
I'd better take you home with me, Hiroshi... because I don't think your dad is coming back.

[Carol recalls in her diary how she and the kids found Scottie's maple sapling dead from radiation exposure]
... Scottie's tree... I can't write today.

[final lines of the film]
We should remember it all... the good, and the bad.
[it is implied that Carol, Hiroshi and Brad are the only people left in the United States, possibly the world, who haven't died yet from radiation poisoning]
